00010     static CVideoFilter* CreateInstance(std::string name)
00011     {
00012         if(name == colorFilterName) return new CColorFilter();
00013         else if(name == waveFilterName) return new CWaveFilter();
00014         else if(name == delayFilterName) return new CDelayFilter();
00015         else if(name == treshFilterName) return new CTreshFilter();
00016         else if(name == blurFilterName) return new CBlurFilter();
00017         else if(name == weightFilterName) return new CWeightFilter();
00018         else if(name == grayFilterName) return new CGrayFilter();
00019         else if(name == squareFilterName) return new CSquareFilter();
00020         else if(name == fadeawayFilterName) return new CFadeawayFilter();
00021         else return NULL;
00022     }
00023 };
